alert.note: Alert for Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 09 at 2:08AM PST until February 10 at 4:00PM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...HEAT ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 6 PM PST SUNDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 PM PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Heat Advisory, temperatures up to 88 expected. For the Wind Advisory, northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire and Orange County Inland Areas. * WHEN...For the Heat Advisory, from 11 AM this morning to 6 PM PST Sunday. For the Wind Advisory, from 10 PM this evening to 4 PM PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hot temperatures may cause heat illnesses to occur.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Drink plenty of fluids and stay out of the sun. Young children and pets should never be left unattended in vehicles under any circumstances.

area.areaDesc: Orange County Inland; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire
